movies.title: Kuriren
movies.plot: Drug-running biker Erik Strah is found on a beach, his neck broken and the drugs gone - to the fury of vicious drugs baron Jovan Brankovic who runs the racket under cover of the Bloodhounds, the Ystad motor cyclists' group. Another member,Hans Kolt, gets a visit from officers Svartman and Isabelle about suspected dog fights. Svartman is attacked by a dog and Isabelle is later confronted in her flat by a masked man warning her from giving evidence. She wants to quit the force but Public Prosecutor Katarina gets Wallander to persuade her to stay. Looking for his senile old mother,who has gone walkabout from her care home, pathologist Nyberg accidentally stumbles on a disused church where the drugs gang meets. When another young biker, Johannes, is intimidated into taking over from Erik,Wallander and his team are in a position to follow him, raid the church and catch the villains.
movies.simplePlot: Drug-running biker Erik Strah is found on a beach, his neck broken and the drugs gone - to the fury of vicious drugs baron Jovan Brankovic who runs the racket under cover of the Bloodhounds...

biography.bio: Krister Henriksson was born on November 12, 1946 in Häverö, Stockholms län, Sweden as Jan Krister Allan Henriksson. He is an actor and director, known for Wallander: enquêtes criminelles (2005), Reconstruction (2003) and Infidèle (2000). He has been married to Cecilia Nilsson since 1988. They have one child.
biography.name: Krister Henriksson

biography.bio: Lena Endre was born on July 8, 1955 in Härnösand, Västernorrlands län, Sweden. She is an actress, known for The Girl with the Dragon Tattoo (2009), The Girl Who Played with Fire (2009) and The Girl Who Kicked the Hornet's Nest (2009). She was previously married to Richard Hobert, Thomas Hanzon, Vjeko Benzon and Malte Ekblom.
biography.name: Lena Endre

biography.bio: Stina Ekblad was born on February 26, 1954 in Solf, Finland. She is an actress, known for Love Is All You Need (2012), Hjälp! (2007) and Une solution rationnelle (2009).
biography.name: Stina Ekblad

biography.bio: Mats Bergman was born on May 5, 1948 in Gothenburg, Västra Götalands län, Sweden. He is an actor, known for Wallander: enquêtes criminelles (2005), Evil (2003) and Den ofrivillige golfaren (1991).
biography.name: Mats Bergman

biography.bio: Douglas Johansson was born on January 31, 1960. He is an actor, known for The Impossible (2012), Wallander: enquêtes criminelles (2005) and Arn: The Knight Templar (2007).
biography.name: Douglas Johansson

biography.bio: Nina Zanjani was born on September 1, 1981 in Stockholm, Stockholms län, Sweden. She is an actress, known for Mind the Gap (2007), Balls (2010) and Wallander: enquêtes criminelles (2005).
biography.name: Nina Zanjani

biography.bio: Sverrir Gudnason was born on September 12, 1978. He is an actor, known for Valse pour Monica (2013), Gentlemen (2014) and Blowfly Park (2014).
biography.name: Sverrir Gudnason

biography.bio: Fredrik Gunnarsson was born on September 4, 1965 in Oxelösund, Östergötlands län, Sweden. He is an actor, known for Wallander: enquêtes criminelles (2005), Show Me Love (1998) and Lycka till och ta hand om varandra (2012).
biography.name: Fredrik Gunnarsson

biography.bio: Noah Valdfogel is an actor, known for Skorna (2009) and Wallander: enquêtes criminelles (2005).
biography.name: Noah Valdfogel

biography.bio: Sophus K. Windeløv was born on September 1, 1979. He is known for his work on Dogville (2003), Catch That Girl (2002) and Det andet liv (2013). He has been married to Mille Lehfeldt since 2008.
biography.name: Sophus K. Windeløv

biography.bio: Before beginning her studies at the Danish National School of Theatre in 2000, Beate Bille had already appeared in the films "Angel of the night" and "The art of success". By the time she graduated in 2004, she had been offered her first leading role in the feature film "Menslaughter". This film, which won several Scandinavian film awards, gave her the opportunity to create an intense portrait of a young leftwing activist involved in an affair with a former teacher, played by Danish actor Jesper Christensen. She plays opposite the German actress Hanna Schygulla in "Die blaue Grenze". Appearances in Emmy Award winning Danish TV series include roles in "Unit One", "Taxa", "Ornen", and "Nikolaj og Julie". At 2006 she was selected as the Danish Shooting Star at the Berlinale Festival. She presently has a part in Hella Joof's "Fidibus" and Nikolai Arcels' film, "De fortabte Sjaeles O", which opens in 2007.
biography.name: Beate Bille

biography.bio: Rafael Pettersson was born on December 22, 1976. He is an actor and director, known for The Bridge (2011), Sensoria (2015) and Piraterna (2014).
biography.name: Rafael Pettersson

biography.bio: Dragomir Mrsic is an actor and producer, known for Edge of Tomorrow (2014), Easy Money (2010) and Easy Money II: Hard to Kill (2012).
biography.name: Dragomir Mrsic

biography.bio: Zeljko Santrac is an actor, known for When Darkness Falls (2006), Johan Falk: Spelets regler (2012) and Johan Falk: Kodnamn: Lisa (2012).
biography.name: Zeljko Santrac

biography.bio: Tomas Köhler is an actor, known for The Girl with the Dragon Tattoo (2009), The Girl Who Kicked the Hornet's Nest (2009) and Tjocktjuven (2006).
biography.name: Tomas Köhler
